participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Alex enjoys engaging in conversations that help him learn more about others.
participant_1.background: Alex has a degree in marketing and works for a tech startup. He loves exploring new ideas and meeting diverse individuals.

participant_2.name: Maria Lopez
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, Maria likes to understand the motivations behind people's choices and actions.
participant_2.background: Maria is a recent graduate with a degree in psychology and is currently working as a research assistant. She has a passion for human behavior and communication.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
